name: full_stack_scripts
description: Used to run scripts in Front_End and Back_end

scripts.install:all: npm install && concurrently "cd ../Back_End/Node/ && npm install" "cd ../Front_End/React && npm install"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "cd ../Back_End/Node/ && npm run start:nodemon" "cd ../Front_End/React && npm run start"
scripts.test:watch:all: concurrently "cd ../Back_End/Node/ && npm run test:watch" "cd ../Front_End/React && npm run test:watch"
